name: hm05
effect: Teaches Defog to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon. (HS: Whirlpool DPP: Defog Gen III & II & I: Flash)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Looses a powerful
blast of light that
reduces accuracy.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Looses a powerful
blast of light that
reduces accuracy.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A blast of light
that cuts the foe’s
accuracy. It also
illuminates caves.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
Obstacles are moved, reducing the
foe’s evasion stat. It can also be
used to clear deep fog.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Obstacles are moved, reducing the
foe’s evasion stat. It can also be
used to clear deep fog.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
Traps foes in a violent swirling
whirlpool. It can also be used to
traverse whirlpools.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user charges the target at an
awesome speed. It can also be used
to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user charges the target at an
awesome speed. It can also be used
to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user charges at the target and may make it
flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user charges at the target and may make it
flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user charges at the target and may make it
flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:

flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.
